set_nrel_api_key[source]

set_nrel_api_key(api_key)

Globally set the API key

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

check_api_key[source]

check_api_key()

Check if API Key has been set. If not set, a ValueError will be raised. If set, returns the API KEY.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Globally set your NREL Developer API key.

{% raw %} 
set_nrel_api_key(123)
{% endraw %}
